title: Unable to Mystery Gift Skin in Post Game Lobby
body:
Hello,

I have tried on multiple occasions to mystery gift a player who did very well in my game a mystery skin, but I do not have the option to. I only see options to mystery gift champions or a skin from the character they just played. I cant find anywhere that they removed the feature.

Am I doing something wrong?

replies.body:
As far as I'm aware, those are the options available for Mystery Gifting players in the post-game lobby. Check out our [Mystery Gifting FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752934-Mystery-Gifting-FAQ) for more information.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
That mystery gifting faq is only friends, I was referring to the post game lobby.

I understand that, I was also providing you with additional context on how Mystery Gifting works. Can you [provide me a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) of what options you have when you try to mystery gift someone in post-game lobby?
